Package com.rivescript

Interface Summary
ObjectHandler Base class for object language handlers.
 

Class Summary
Client An object to represent an individual user's data.
ClientManager A manager for all the bot's users.
Inheritance An inheritance tracker to aid in sorting replies.
RiveScript A RiveScript interpreter written in Java.
StringCompare A comparator class to sort strings by length, longest to shortest.
Topic A topic manager class for RiveScript.
TopicManager A topic manager class for RiveScript.
Trigger A trigger class for RiveScript.
Util Utility methods.
